data.title: Companies and institutions in the Freiburg region
data.text:
highQ Computerl√∂sungen GmbH offers intelligent solutions for mobility and controlling. With innovative software solutions, companies and municipalities are supported in the effective planning, implementation and optimization of their tasks. Companies, as well as cities and communities, can renew their mobility, optimize the flow of traffic and increase the quality of life. highQ offers consulting, supports the implementation and simultaneously provides the solution with innovative software products. This is how highQ supports you on the way to GreenCity!

We are a leading international solution provider for industrial energy projects with a key focus on thermal projects. For solar process heating we have our own collector, the innovative LF-11 Fresnel collector, which is optimized for industrial applications. As a one-stop-shop we offer turnkey solutions for customers in several industries. Our technologies supply clean energy for heating, cooling and electricity. Based on a comprehensive engineering, we identify the optimal technology mix for our clients' needs.

We focus on knowledge transfer and education for sustainable development. Travel with us into the future today and let yourself be inspired by innovative showcase projects in Freiburg and the Upper Rhine region. Find out more about citizen participation, urban planning, climate-friendly mobility, architecture, renewable energies and a sustainable lifestyle. Several thousand visitors from over 40 nations take part in our programs every year. Our offer: Individual day programs for delegations | Interactive tours for school classes | Multi-day seminars for specialist groups and universities | Online lectures

Pure, clean water is one of the essential things in life, yet it‚Äôs exposed to a large number of pollutants. GRAF develops, manufactures and markets an extensive range of products for water management. We provide solutions to global challenges, such as protecting watersourses, purifying wastewater and preventing flooding, with typical German quality. Our focus is on avoiding environmental pollution and having a re- sponsible attitude towards people and nature. We can draw on our experience of over 55 years in business.

QUMsult GmbH & Co. KG is a consulting agency for quality, environment aspects, and occupational safety located in Freiburg, Germany. Our clients are companies from many different branches. Founded in 1995, our team includes four partners and three employees.

Adapted to individual company needs, QUMsult offers the following assistance with quality, environment, and occupational safety:

Consulting, to improve or further develop processes

Training, to make innovation succeed

Workshops, to help reach common solutions

Outside consultants, for when your own internal resources are not enough.

QUMsult helps companies improve their level of sustainability, precisely where it is needed. One source makes services and appropriate tools available. Companies can only profit from this - short communication paths, sustainable solutions, and business success.

QUMsult focuses its activities in the south-west region of Germany, but also has numerous clients throughout Germany and several abroad. QUMsult is certified under ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 14001:2015.

The Solar Info Center is a hub of expertise for renewable energies and energy-optimized planning, building and managing, home to over 20 companies and more than 500 employees. The building is certified with the LEED Platinum sustainability label (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design). The concept of the SIC is based on geothermal energy, photovoltaics, solar thermal energy and a natural cooling system, among other things - an extraordinary and unprecedented themed property for renewable energies and energy efficiency.

For more than 30 years now, Taifun-Tofu GmbH has been producing organic tofu specialties. Every day, about 270 employees are doing their very best to produce the delicious food that carries the labels Taifun and Tukan. Today, Taifun-Tofu is one of the leading market manufacturers of organic tofu in Europe. Ever since, the food producer has been involved with organic farming, GM-free production and sustainability: 100% of its soy needs are being fulfilled by contracted organic farming in Germany, Austria and France.
